title: Love Is All Around
lyrics: I fee l it in my fingers, I feel it in my toes … … … …. Well, love is all around me, and so the feeling grows … … …. It's written on the wind, it's everywhere I go … … … …. So if you really love me, come on and let it show … … … …. You know I love you, I always will. My mind's made up by the way that I feel. There's no beginning, there'll be no end. Cos on my love you can depend.
